paragraph:
More people are migrating to other countries than ever before

The last 50 years have seen an increasing number of immigrants to other countries. People moved due to a number of reasons, namely better educations or higher salary jobs. Some people thought that they should follow the local customs in order to integrate into their adopted countries’ cultures. However I strongly believe that they are able to sustain their cultural identities and doing so help they keep their origin values.

components.span: they are able to sustain their cultural identities and doing so help they keep their origin values

noise: People migrate to other countries less often nowadays.

paragraph: Firstly, maintaining one’s cultural identity is a key important rule to help individuals emerge in the new multicultural environments. Take Australia for example, immigrants from varieties of nations have a day called multicultural day where people from each country prepare their food and traditional activities for displaying in the public venues. Many Australians come this day to enjoy the shows, learn about the cultures and admire the diverse values. These feedbacks, in turn, help raise one’s pride of their cultures and help people understand each other more. Thus this makes it clear that sustaining the cultural values of immigrants is paramount essential.

components.span: maintaining one’s cultural identity is a key important rule to help individuals emerge in the new multicultural environments

Many Australians come this day to enjoy the shows, learn about the cultures and admire the diverse values
These feedbacks, in turn, help raise one’s pride of their cultures and help people understand each other more
sustaining the cultural values of immigrants is paramount essential

relations.reasons: Maintaining one's cultural identity is crucial when living in a multicultural environment. It is necessary to sustain the cultural values of immigrants.
Multicultural day celebrates cultural values. Immigrants' cultural values are very important. Traditional activities preserve cultural values.

Learning about different cultures involves understanding immigrant communities. Appreciating diverse values means sustaining those very values. If there's no joy in experiencing something (like enjoying the show), why would anyone consider it 'paramount'?

Understanding different cultures through feedbacks preserves its value. People take pride in their own culture when they see the importance of preserving immigrant's cultural values. It is crucial (paramount) to make sure everyone understands each other.

noise: Immigrants do not need to maintain their cultural identities when moving to a new country.

paragraph: Secondly, it is crucial to keep one’s identity for they need a connection back to their country as well as teach their children their value of origin. For instance, children immigrated to a new country will face social troubles in school with new friends. In this new environment, parent should find friends coming from their same country so that they can socialize in a very familiar manner as feeling being home. Fail to create this familiarity makes them felt isolated, in the extreme can lead to social disorder like autism. Hence, it is clear that keeping the cultural traditions in the destination countries is tremendous important.

relations.reasons: Keeping your own identity means keeping your culture alive. It's very important (crucial) when moving to another country (destination).

Children who immigate may experience social troubles due to lack of understanding of local culture (cultural tradition). Making new friends when moving to a different place means adapting to a new environment or 'destination'.

Parents want to keep cultural traditions when moving abroad. People feel comfortable while socializing if there's familiarity around them. Maintaining cultural traditions is especially crucial in foreign lands (destination countries). When people feel like they're back home, they tend to socialize more easily due to increased sense of familiarity.

Keeping familiarities through cultural traditions prevents people feeling isolated. People who feel isolated may develop social disorders such as autism when they move to new destination countries without any support system.

paragraph:
Email and text messaging threats written language

The introduction of email and text messaging has brought about considerable changes in communication. With this situation, some people believe that they may be factors decreasing the position of written language. I am in favor of that idea because of their advantages and the fact we can see today about the use of these new means.

paragraph: First of all, it is easy to point out many benefits users can get from email and text messaging, which answers to the question of their great popularity. Before email and mobile phone, human beings communicated by meeting directly, sending letters or later, calling from home phones. Such ways usually made people have troubles for the expensiveness, difficulties in far communication or emergency and the loss of information. However, email and cell phones have improved the obstacles above. People can send or receive electronic letters anywhere and anytime they want. Especially, thanks to the function provided by email and text messaging (SMS), it is cheaper and faster to transfer a lot of information, even to many people at the same time. They are so convenient that the majority of population prefer to use them instead of some traditional ways.

paragraph:
Computer has negative effects to children

Nowadays, thanks to the development of technology, computer is now indispensable to life. Some people think that computer is good for children and it should be used daily by children but some others think differently. In my opinion, the latter opinion is true.
noise: Children should use computers every day.

paragraph: First, using computer constantly has bad influence on children's eyes. When they concentrate on computer for too long, their eyes will get tired, which is the main reason for some eyes problems, typically shortsighted.

components.span: using computer constantly has bad influence on children's eyes
When they concentrate on computer for too long, their eyes will get tired, which is the main reason for some eyes problems, typically shortsighted

relations.reasons: Constantly concentrating on computers causes eye strain. Prolonged exposure to screens harms kids' vision. Eye fatigue due to excessive screen time contributes to various eye issues including myopia (short-sightedness). Excessive computer usage negatively impacts young people's ocular health.
related_key_phrases: Main reason for some eyes problems

noise: Children who play video games often have sharper vision than those who do not.

paragraph: Moreover, children who play games too much on computer can seriously lack communicating skills, they will know little about the outside life. It is a well-known fact that people who are addicted to games, especially online games, can eventually bear dangerous consequences. For instance, several teenagers play games without rest, which leads to health depression, a typical example is the death of Korean gamer, who had a non-stop playing for 3 days.

paragraph:
Technology that widen the gap between rich and poor?

Technology, in the past two hundred years, has taken a dramatic progress in many fields of our society, such as telecommunications, manufacturing and buildings, etc. Certainly, technologies have also contributed to the great change of our daily lives. However, today some people consider that the range of technology regarding of public has a negative effect on increasing the gap between rich and poor. Personally, I find it hard for me to agree with this opinion by the following reasons.
noise: The impact of technology on widening the gap between the rich and the poor is exaggerated.

paragraph: In the first instance, the progress of material technology leads to the sharp fall of price of a great number of products. About ten years ago, mobile phones ware very expensive for most members of my country, only a few of rich individuals have enough money to buy one. Today, mobile phones become a common one of household items, which due to the cheaper materials and better producing technologies. Thus, most members of our society can benefit from the consequences of technical advancements, especially the poor people.

Advances in material technology lead to lower prices on various goods. Lower production costs result in cheaper materials being used. Improved manufacturing techniques enable mass production of quality products at affordable prices.

Advances in material technology lead to technological advancements. As prices drop due to advances in material technology, most members of our society will benefit. With lower-priced goods resulting from material technology advancement, even the poor people can afford them.

In addition, the Internet gives everyone access to the same information, this therefore leads to greater equality between individuals.

paragraph:
Sporting events easing international tensions, releasing patriotic feelings

For most folks on Earth, the need to gather in one place, and enjoy competition with other talented people from different cultures through popular games has always been a strong motivation. This trend is so deeply engraved in people's mind that the organisation of such events continue to be planned, even when some participants are facing grievous social problems. It is agreed that large scale sports games make people focus on attractive contests instead of international disputes, and help them being proud of their nation. This will be proved by analysing how sports events may be an important link to the peace, and by how they encourage people to display their national symbols.

components.span: large scale sports games make people focus on attractive contests instead of international disputes, and help them being proud of their nation

noise: Non-native speakers who don't speak English fluently have an advantage over native speakers in academic settings.

paragraph: Firstly, during times of war, people living in badly affected countries can forget about the gloomy environment and maintain a link with the rest of the world by listening to international sports event. For example, when Irak was hardly struck by the Second Gulf War, its citizens tried to catch any incoming news about the FootballWorld Cup through their portable receivers. This clearly shows that international sports competitions encourage people and put pressure on them to come back, sooner or later, to a relative peaceful normality. Thus, world sports events strongly participate in eventually pulling back people towards friendship and peace.

South African national and traditional songs were played in the streets throughout the night. This example demonstrates how people might take numerous elements from their roots and history to proudly display them while supporting their team. As a result, it is clear that people can freely express their patriotic feelings during international sports events.

paragraph:
Should teenagers learn all school subjects/focus on one subject

Presently, it is commonly accepted that students have to learn over eight subjects in school. Public retain differing views on whether to teach students all subjects or just focus on one subject. Some parents are satisfied with the full class schedule of their children. While, others claim that studying only one subject is more effective. Before rendering my own opinion, I will explore sides of this topic.
noise: Students don't need to learn multiple subjects, they can just focus on one subject throughout their lives.

paragraph: The benefits of teaching students different units are easily recognized. In the first place, with some basic knowledge of diverse fields, students have more options in choosing specialized areas or jobs in the future. Teenagers are still too young and immature to decide what they are going to dedicate. In students' point of view, the combination of difficult and easy subjects balances their schoolwork stress and fosters their enthusiasm on classes. However, still many teenagers cannot enjoy the variation of the curriculum, instead, they feel more stressful with so much homework and exams to be done. Besides, most students regard the extra knowledge useless and impractical for their future jobs.

most students regard the extra knowledge useless and impractical for their future jobs

paragraph:
Is a break good or bad after high school for students

Studies are an essential part of life. Some countries permit students to take a break from studies between high school and university studies, while in some countries, it is considered as waste of time. However, a break of one year is good for young people after finishing their high school.

paragraph: In most education systems, a child studies continuously from the age of 5 till 16 years of age. A relaxation of one year to young minds will give them a quintessential change. A continuous study pressure for over 10 years makes the mind saturated and like a robot, to follow instructions. Personally, a break will give students some time to refresh their systems, by traveling or following their hobbies. Importantly, when students start their university studies after a break, they will feel fresh and full of energy to take the new challenge.

paragraph:
should one follow fashion trends rather than a personal style?

With increasing availability to the Internet, people can collect a wealth of information about the latest fashion trends over the world, such as the most popular shoes style this season or the best-liked clothes color this year. paragraph: This is because following fashion trends enables people to keep up with the world's latest transformations, which is of vital importance if we consider the fact that people are living in a global village today. When individuals keep the habit of grasping the world's cutting-edge fashion information, they are gradually changing their attitudes to viewing the world, which means they are more open to accept diverse voices from people around the world. In contrast, if they stuck to their own fashion styles, disregarding the world's top fashion designers' achievements, they would stay conservative in their own worlds. As a result, they might fall behind shortly.

People may fall behind due to lack of knowledge on recent changes (latest transformation). Keeping pace with current events is crucial because we live in a rapidly changing world (vital importance) or even globally connected community (living in a global village). I prefer to spend my entire live in one place which is my hometown. In my hometown, I have a lot of friends and good relationships, I love the traffic in here, and the environment is wonderful.

In my hometown, I have a lot of friends and good relationships, I love the traffic in here, and the environment is wonderful

paragraph: I was born and grew up in here, a small town. In here, I have a lot of friends, and we usually spend free time to play sports like soccer, basketball and of course we have a lot of fun. Every people in my town have known each others, and we have good relationships. If anyone needs help, his neighbor will help as much as possible. Nowhere else can give me some people like in here.

When neighbors know each other well, they provide mutual support. Having good relationships means being willing to lend a helping hand when someone needs it.
Neighbors are made up of people who live nearby. When someone asks for help, they usually ask their neighbors first.

paragraph:
I'm against providing more money to professors

University education is always an important part of one's life. That's why education in university is discussed all the time. What is the best way to orientate the students? Raising the salaries of professors so? I would say no. The professors are essential, however, the schools are established for students. Money should spend on facilities in school or update resources, which are beneficial to school rather than just instructors. The following are my opinions.

components.span: The professors are essential
the schools are established for students
Money should spend on facilities in school or update resources, which are beneficial to school rather than just instructors

relations.reasons: Schools need professors. Students require essential knowledge or services provided by professors.

noise: The salary of the professor does not matter.

paragraph: To begin with, the school should put more emphasis on students instead of professors. I think the most efficient way to improve the education is to guide the students to learn actively. By renewing some facilities in school so students will spend more time at school doing assignment. A comfortable environment can attract people to stay longer. Thus, students spend more time on school to make a good circulation of learning. That is to say, students have a better environment to working on their assignments so the quality of their assignments will improve. Thus, the competition between peers enhances and forms a circulation. In my school, the classrooms in my university are old and kind of shabby. For me, I prefer spending money in a coffee shop to staying at school to finish my assignment. It's unpleasant to stay at school. However, coffee shops are not always quiet, so my classmates and I often finish our work roughly.

components.span: the school should put more emphasis on students instead of professors
the most efficient way to improve the education is to guide the students to learn actively
By renewing some facilities in school so students will spend more time at school doing assignment
A comfortable environment can attract people to stay longer
students spend more time on school to make a good circulation of learning
students have a better environment to working on their assignments
the quality of their assignments will improve
the competition between peers enhances and forms a circulation
In my school, the classrooms in my university are old and kind of shabby
I prefer spending money in a coffee shop to staying at school to finish my assignment
It's unpleasant to stay at school
coffee shops are not always quiet, so my classmates and I often finish our work roughly

relations.reasons: Guiding students towards active learning will help them understand things much better. By putting an emphasis on students rather than professors, schools can focus on improving their educational system.
By renovating schools, students may focus more on their studies rather than teachers. Students do homework under supervision of professors.

("Old", "Students") # Reason: Older buildings may need renovation before they could provide suitable environment for students. ("Shabby", "Professor") # Reason: Poor maintenance of classroom reflects poorly on the institution and its faculty members (professors). ("Classroom", "Student") # Reason: Better learning environments improve student outcomes.

Spending time in a coffee shop may help students relax and focus their minds. Staying at home or library might allow them to complete assignments without distractions like those found in a coffee shop; however this could also mean they're missing out on valuable interactions with peers who could provide support during difficult times when working through challenging material together! Emphasizing student needs over professor's interests would likely lead people towards wanting spend less time doing homework because there wouldn't feel obligated do extra reading outside class since teachers aren’t pushing hard enough already so why bother right? But really though if everyone just focused solely themselves then nobody gets anything done anymore...it becomes pointless trying accomplish anything worthwhile anyway!!
Staying at an unpleasant place like school affects students' learning experience. Putting emphasis on students rather than professors might make school less unpleasant.

Coffee shops are usually noisy places where one cannot focus or emphasize their studies. In class, there are both students and professors; however, the former need more attention. When working together, people rely heavily on their colleagues (classmates) who are also students like them.
Spending more time on school contributes to a good circulation of learning. Renovating schools' facilities encourages spending more time there working on assignments.
Renewed facilities form a new circulation. Enhanced peer interaction encourages students to stay longer at school.
People tend to stay longer when they feel comfortable around them. Spending more time at school allows for a good circulation of knowledge among students.
Better environment means higher assignment quality. Working on assignments directly relates to improving them.
Improved peer competition results in improved quality of assignments. Enhanced peer competition creates a circulation among them.

noise: Students don't need to be guided to learn actively because they already know everything.

paragraph: Besides, the ultimate purpose is to change, to motivate students to be better. To improve education, spending more money to raise professors' salary is inappropriate. In addition, will the university filter all the professors overall? Some professors don't deserve the money at all, then, what's the point to spend money on them? High-salary instructors don't teach students harder because they earn more money. There won't be any effect if school does so. There was news about raising professors' salary in my country. This event provoked a demonstration composing of students mostly. The proposal of the demonstration was eliminating the raising salaries. As you can see, if the policy of raising salary was supported, the demonstration would not happen.

if the policy of raising salary was supported, the demonstration would not happen

Schools play an important role in improving education. Raising professors' salaries may affect schools financially.

paragraph:
Recent medical problems and sedentary lifestyle.

It is certainly true that modern people are facing up to a new health problems and ailments than before. Many people claim that it is because of sedentary lifestlyle. However, while I accept that sedentary lifestyle is one of the key factors, I believe that some other factors are having even a greater impact.

paragraph: To begin with, I agree that sedentary lifestyle lead to many serious health problems. The main reason why people are becoming so addicted to sitting at their homes even for the whole day is an advance technology. In earlier times, for instance, even the types of entertainment tools were not in large numbers and all of them required physical presence and as a result they had more outdoor activities. Nowadays people, especially inhabitants of cities, are spending most of their time on sitting in front of TV or other tools.

paragraph: Nevertheless, there are some other causes why people are experiencing serious medical problems. Firstly, the environment of the modern world polluted very significantly from greenhouse gas emissions and other gasses. Many people, for example, are suffering from allergy because of these gasses. Secondly, foods with a low quality such as fast foods, junk foods and any genetically modified ones are influencing to our health very negatively. Finally, life becoming more stressful due to some recent problems such as traffic gam, traffic accidents and others.

paragraph:
Increased taxation on petrol and diesel fuel to discourage private cars?

There is no doubt our life has had a change for the better since cars were introduced. However, cars themselves, especially private ones, have exerted severe pressure on the environment and economy for wasteful oil consumption. While many believe that petrol and diesel fuel should be charged with the highest taxation, I strongly disagree with this notion.

components.span: While many believe that petrol and diesel fuel should be charged with the highest taxation, I strongly disagree with this notion

noise: Taxation on petrol and diesel fuel should actually increase to encourage private car use.

paragraph: One can not deny the fact that if petrol and fuel taxation are raised, people might hesitate choosing a personal automobile. Taxation may have tackled the environmental issue simply by diverting people to public transportations such as trains, buses or ferries. Additionally, for those who have already afforded a car, there is a likelihood it is restraint from usage on long journeys or to crowded cities.

components.span: if petrol and fuel taxation are raised, people might hesitate choosing a personal automobile
Taxation may have tackled the environmental issue simply by diverting people to public transportations such as trains, buses or ferries
for those who have already afforded a car, there is a likelihood it is restraint from usage on long journeys or to crowded cities

relations.reasons: Raising petrol taxes will help reduce pollution (environmental issues). Increasing fuel taxes also contributes to reducing air pollution (environmental issues). Using public transports like train, bus or ferry reduces reliance on personal vehicles.

Cars contribute to an environmental issue. Reducing private vehicle usage promotes public transportation. Taking trains reduces traffic congestion during long journeys. Using buses decreases traffic density within crowded cities. Traveling via ferry also minimizes urban traffic problems.

noise: The increase in petrol and fuel taxation will actually boost sales of personal automobiles.

paragraph: However, taxation on flamable resources might backfire by conducing to inflation. To be precise, the more costly petrol is, the higher the price of necessary product: rice, meat or even vegetable. Consequently, people have to turn to cheaper alternatives, which might cause the abundance in goods and later on, economic crisis.

components.span: taxation on flamable resources might backfire by conducing to inflation
the more costly petrol is, the higher the price of necessary product: rice, meat or even vegetable
people have to turn to cheaper alternatives, which might cause the abundance in goods and later on, economic crisis

relations.reasons: Imposing taxation on flammable resources may lead to an economic crisis. High prices due to inflation force people to look for cheaper alternatives.

When petrol becomes expensive, people look for cheaper alternatives. An abundance of goods may lead to an economic crisis. High cost of essential items like food causes people to buy cheap substitutes leading to overproduction and eventually causing economic instability.

noise: Taxation on flammable resources has a very positive impact on the economy.

America, for example, has recently drawn its intervention in Russian crisis only due to the influx of oil.

paragraph:
The environment problems facing today's world are so great

Nowadays, many countries are concerned with the environment problems. There is a viewpoint that the government and big firms should assume the responsibility to protect the environment and normal citizens have nothing to do for that. Personally, I think both government and common people should have the responsibility for the environment, but we need to analyze some specific situations.

components.span: both government and common people should have the responsibility for the environment

noise: Environment problems are not a big deal.

paragraph: On one hand, solving some environmental problems needs large budgets and various technologies, and the government and corporations have the ability to deal with these problems. For example, air pollution and water quality has concerned many countries, and the government is able to implement some policies and invest money to reduce air pollution, while companies also can enhance their technologies to curb emission of contaminated water and substances. However, individuals are unable to cope with these things.

components.span: solving some environmental problems needs large budgets and various technologies, and the government and corporations have the ability to deal with these problems

air pollution and water quality has concerned many countries, and the government is able to implement some policies and invest money to reduce air pollution, while companies also can enhance their technologies to curb emission of contaminated water and substances
individuals are unable to cope with these things

relations.reasons: Reducing air pollution solves an environmental problem. Improving water quality addresses another type of environmental issue. Implementing government policies often require large budgets. Enhancing companies' technology involves using various methods. Corporations have the capacity to handle complex issues like environmental problems.

Governments help individuals who cannot solve their own problems. Solving big problems like environmental issues require large budgets. Using new technologies also need huge investments (large budget). Companies play an important role when dealing with complex problems such as environmental ones.

noise: Individuals can easily solve environmental problems with little effort and small budget.

paragraph: Besides, the government and firms could have significant influences on environmental awareness of people. It is necessary for every citizen to have the awareness and knowledge of environment protection. This means that we should convey corresponding policies and knowledge to the public and society, and the government controls many influential media, such as TV stations and newspapers, which can provide plenty of environmental knowledge and related policies to citizens.

components.span: the government and firms could have significant influences on environmental awareness of people
It is necessary for every citizen to have the awareness and knowledge of environment protection
we should convey corresponding policies and knowledge to the public and society
the government controls many influential media, such as TV stations and newspapers, which can provide plenty of environmental knowledge and related policies to citizens

relations.reasons: Governments and companies can raise environmental awareness through conveying relevant information. Companies can share their expertise (knowledge) to help create corresponding policies. Raising environmental awareness will lead to creation of new policies.

We need to raise people's awareness on environmental issues so they know what needs to be done. Having relevant knowledge will help us make informed decisions when creating policies. Protecting our environment involves having the right information (knowledge) to guide our actions and create suitable policies.

Governments controlling media enables them to convey important information to people. Media under government influence conveys relevant policies to the public. Sharing environmental knowledge through controlled media promotes awareness among citizens. Controlled media disseminates policies effectively to the masses.

noise: The government has no influence on public environmental awareness at all.

paragraph: On the other hand, it is possible for ordinary people to participate in some actions of environment protection, and they also can benefit from the improvement of environment. For instance, many people driving private cars could cause air pollution, and overusing plastic packages would affect the environment. If people can gradually change some lifestyles in these daily activities, this will have many significant impacts on environmental improvement.

many people driving private cars could cause air pollution, and overusing plastic packages would affect the environment

relations.reasons: Reducing private car usage contributes to environmental protection. Decreasing air pollution will bring us benefits when the environment gets improved. Minimizing plastic package usage encourages ordinary people's participation in protecting the environment. Protecting our environment now brings long-term benefits.

People who make gradual changes in their lives are considered ordinary people. Changing our daily habits allows us to contribute to protecting the environment. Improving the environment brings numerous advantages to everyone involved.
